title: 2 BR, balcony overlooking brook, central air,  quiet building
posting_body: Waltham, in beautiful Bentley Univ. area.
Convenient to Newton, Lexington, Cambridge, Boston.
About 15-20 minute walk to Moody St. restaurants, movie theatre, commuter rail.
2 bedrooms with very good closet space.
Large living room-dining area, Sliders to balcony.
Very nice tile bath with large linen closet.
Kitchen has gas stove, frost-free frig, plenty of counter and cabinet space.
Laundry, parking, central A/C.  Rent includes hot water.
This is in a  clean, quiet and very well-maintained building.
Please tell a little about yourself and include a number if you would like more information.
